items.sentence: I wonder whether Tom knows Mary was involved in a traffic accident.
Tom wasn't able to get into the university that he wanted to go to.
Many people think children don't spend enough time playing outside.
The car that I have now is much better than the one I used to have.
A spoonful of honey will catch more flies than a gallon of vinegar.
The man standing in front of the hotel asked me if I needed a taxi.
I only met Tom three weeks ago, but I think we'll be great friends.
It took far less time to house-train my Alsatian than my other dog.
In both appearance and personality, Tom is exactly like his father.
I thought that Tom might be waiting for us in front of the station.
